item.title: FogBugs and Kiln World Tour
item.description: Last Thursday I was fortunate enough to get a place on the FogBugz and Kiln World Tour. I booked it before I moved jobs, and I’ll be honest I had no real interest in the software. I’ve been reading Joel’s books and blogs since my friend Brent bought me Joel on SoftwareÂ and made me read it (he had the foresight to know I’d want to hang on to his copy if he’d lent it to me!
